game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the lost temple.
game.description: The village elder has asked for your help in retrieving an ancient scroll that is hidden within the long-abandoned temple on the outskirts of the village. The scroll is said to hold the secrets of the ancient civilization that once flourished there.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a magical amulet

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's layout
task.description: Speak with the local villagers to gather any information they may have about the temple's layout and potential dangers within.
Enter the temple and explore its entrance chamber, looking for any clues or objects of interest.
Making your way through the temple's treacherous traps and puzzles, retrieve the ancient scroll from its resting place.
task.location: The heart of the lost temple
